ussr.comm - package ussr.comm
An abstract communications model comprising transmitters, receivers, and packets.
ussr.description - package ussr.description
Building blocks for constructing simulation scenarios.
ussr.description.geometry - package ussr.description.geometry
Geometric shapes and properties for defining robots or obstacles in the simulated world.
ussr.description.robot - package ussr.description.robot
Basic building blocks for describing robots in terms of the individual components that make up the module, connectors mounted on each module, etc.
ussr.description.setup - package ussr.description.setup
Classes for defining the overall setup of the simulation.
ussr.model - package ussr.model
An abstract model of a modular robot to be used from the controller.
ussr.physics - package ussr.physics
An abstract model of a physics engine, serves as the interface between physics-engine independent classes and the physics engine.
ussr.physics.jme - package ussr.physics.jme
A physics simulation implementation based on JME (JMonkeyEngine).
ussr.physics.jme.actuators - package ussr.physics.jme.actuators
Provides a collection of actuators for the JME physics engine implementation.
ussr.physics.jme.connectors - package ussr.physics.jme.connectors
Provides a collection of connectors for the JME physics engine implementation.
ussr.physics.jme.robots - package ussr.physics.jme.robots
Robot implementations for the ussr.physics.jme simulation implementation.
ussr.physics.jme.sensors - package ussr.physics.jme.sensors
Provides a collection of sensors for the JME physics engine implementation.
ussr.samples - package ussr.samples
Generic infrastructure for simulations as well as examples of simulations mixing different robots.
ussr.samples.atron - package ussr.samples.atron
Simulation examples based on the ATRON modular self-reconfigurable robot.
ussr.samples.atron.natives - package ussr.samples.atron.natives
ATRON examples based on native (implemented in C) controllers
ussr.samples.atron.network - package ussr.samples.atron.network
ATRON network controller.
ussr.samples.atron.simulations - package ussr.samples.atron.simulations
Concrete examples of ATRON simulations.
ussr.samples.mtran - package ussr.samples.mtran
Preliminary simulations based on the M-TRAN modular self-reconfigurable robot
ussr.samples.odin - package ussr.samples.odin
Defintion of the Odin modular, reconfigurable robot.
ussr.samples.odin.modules - package ussr.samples.odin.modules
Definitions of concrete Odin modules.
ussr.samples.odin.simulations - package ussr.samples.odin.simulations
Concrete Odin simulation examples.
ussr.samples.stickybot - package ussr.samples.stickybot
Small example of a spherical robot with magnetic connectors on its surface.
ussr.samples.white - package ussr.samples.white
Simple and very preliminary example of a reconfigurable robot with hinge-joints at the edges.
ussr.util - package ussr.util
Various utility classes
